decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Drawing no: Ordinance Survey OS100035409 (Site Location Plan) Dated 11 July 2024    
Drawing no: SPR_061 / SP201/RevA  (Proposed Block Plan Amended ) Dated 16 September 2024 
Drawing no: SPR_061 / P201 (Existing Ground Floor Plan And Existing Frist Floor Plan) Dated 11 July 2024
Drawing no: SPR_061 / P202/RevA(Proposed Loft Floor Plan Amended ) Dated 16 September  2024  
Drawing no: SPR_061 / P203/RevA (Proposed Roof Plan Amended) Dated 11 July 2024
Drawing no: SPR_061 / E203/RevA (Proposed Rear Elevation Plan Amended) Dated 16  September 2024 
Drawing no: SPR_061 / S201/RevA(Proposed Section AA Plan Amended) Dated 16 September  2024
Drawing no: SPR_061 / S202(Proposed Section BB Plan) Dated 11 July 2024
Drawing no: SPR_061 / E204/RevA (Proposed Side Elevation Plan Amended To ?63) Dated  16 September 2024 
Drawing no: SPR_061 / E202/RevA (Proposed Side Elevation Plan Amended To ?59) Dated 16 September 2024   
Drawing no: SPR_061 / DAS 201 (Design & Access Statement) Dated 15th July 2024
Design & Access Statement Dated 15th July 2024
Site Photographs Ref SPR_061 / DAS 201 Dated 20 May 2024.

Condition : 3 - Materials as Specified - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - Construction Times - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 5 - Obscured Glazing - Before the development hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the XXX elevation shall be glazed with obscured glass and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE (Party Wall Act) - The applicant is advised to check the requirements of the Party Wall Act 1996 relating to work on an existing wall shared with another property, building on the boundary with a neighbouring property, or excavating near a neighbouring building. Further information is available at the following link: 
https://www.gov.uk/party-walls-building-works

Condition : 7 - INFORMATIVE
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
   ii) The application was approved without delay.
description: ERECTION OF A REAR DORMER OVER OUTRIGGER AND INSERTION OF SKYLIGHT TO THE EXISTING FLAT ROOF.
